text: Tigran Barseghyan (born 22 September 1993) is an Armenian football player who plays midfielder for the Armenian national team and Kazakhstan Premier League side FC Astana. ==Career== ===Club=== Born in Armenian capital Yerevan, Barsegyan played with FC Banants, FC Gandzasar Kapan and FC Mika in the Armenian Premier League.Tigran Barseghyan profile at Soccerway On August 30, 2016, he moved abroad and signed with Macedonian side FK Vardar where his national teammate Hovhannes Hambardzumyan is already playing. After 2 and a half seasons at FK Vardar, considered to be one of the best foreign players to play in Macedonian First Football League by media such as gol.mkБарсегјан: Работната виза ми правеше проблем, веќе си барам нов клуб at gol.mk due to visa problems, he left the club, seeking a new one at the beginning of 2019.Барсегјан: Работната виза ми правеше проблем, веќе си барам нов клуб at gol.mk On 24 January 2020, FC Astana announced the signing of Barseghyan to a two your contract.. ===International=== Barseghyan had played with the Armenian U-21 team in 2014. In 2016, he made his debut for the main Armenian national team.Tigran Barseghyan at National-Football-Teams.com He participated in the 2018–19 UEFA Nations League.
